html: Saddened to hear of Dick Lugar’s passing. I greatly enjoyed serving with him. His leadership on ratification of the New START Treaty was a tremendous contribution to global nonproliferation—it wouldn’t have happened without him. He was a true statesman & will be missed.
text:
Saddened to hear of Dick Lugar’s passing. I greatly enjoyed serving with him.

His leadership on ratification of the New START Treaty was a tremendous contribution to global nonproliferation—it wouldn’t have happened without him. He was a true statesman & will be missed.

html: We need to make sure our military members feel secure in their daily lives while they’re protecting our nation. I recognize that hundreds of thousands of other federal employees are not being paid, and I will do everything I can to fight to right that wrong, as well.

We need to make sure our military members feel secure in their daily lives while they’re protecting our nation.
 
I recognize that hundreds of thousands of other federal employees are not being paid, and I will do everything I can to fight to right that wrong, as well.

html: Patricia and her daughter’s story broke our hearts as she told us about her journey and internment through her tears.

html: Her 15th birthday is this coming Tuesday. It’s supposed to be a special day - her Quinceanera. Instead of celebrating with friends and family, she will be locked up in an internment camp with her mom.
text: Her 15th birthday is this coming Tuesday. It’s supposed to be a special day - her Quinceanera. Instead of celebrating with friends and family, she will be locked up in an internment camp with her mom.

html: Patricia and her daughter have been at Dilley for almost 6 months. Her daughter has been suffering severe depression as a result of the trauma she has experienced—in Honduras and also here in America as a result of her internment

html: The gang molested her daughter and threatened to rape and kill her.
